keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein received a threatening text message on May 24, 2020, which stated 'You will diiiie like your brother, wait for us' and contained a link (grat.in/uxdyd).
Attorney Stacey Richman forwarded this communication, indicating she may be representing or advising Mark L. Epstein regarding this threat.
The threat explicitly references Mark L. Epstein's brother, implying a potential connection to a past event involving his brother's death or harm.
